project_short_description: A cookiecutter package with UCL ARC recommendations.
funder: JBFC: The Joe Bloggs Funding Council

__prompts__.author_email: Email address for package author - will be publicly accessible
__prompts__.project_name: Name for project - may contain spaces
__prompts__.project_slug: 'Slugified' project name for use in URLs - dash-case recommended
__prompts__.package_name: Name for Python package - snake_case recommended
__prompts__.initialise_git_repository: Initialise project directory as a Git repository
__prompts__.deploy_docs_to_github_pages: Automatically deploy HTML docs to GitHub Pages on pushes to main
__prompts__.github_username: GitHub user/organization which will be owner of repository
__prompts__.min_python_version: Minimum Python version supported by package
__prompts__.max_python_version: Maximum Python version supported by package
__prompts__.license: Which open-source license to release package under
__prompts__.funder: Organisation(s) to acknowledge for funding of package development
